sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO YETA3130 ( EDAC_RVYY , SETT_GBCD , MNRN_SQNO , DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , MNRN_NAME , MNRN_RSNO , MNRN_TYHU , MNRN_AREA , MNRN_ADDR , MNRN_STDT , MNRN_EDDT , MNRN_AMNT , MNRN_DUAM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #edacRvyy# , #settGbcd# , (SELECT NVL(MAX(MNRN_SQNO)+1,1) FROM YETA3130 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy# AND SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#) , #dpobCd# , #systemkey# , #mnrnName# , #mnrnRsno# , (fcBass0300ITEMNM(#dpobCd#, #mnrnTyhu#, '11')) , #mnrnArea# , #mnrnAddr# , #mnrnStdt# , #mnrnEddt# , #mnrnAmnt# , (CASE WHEN ((CASE WHEN NVL(#mnrnAmnt#,0) > 7500000 THEN 7500000 ELSE NVL(#mnrnAmnt#,0) END) * 0.10) > 750000 THEN 750000 ELSE (CASE WHEN NVL(#mnrnAmnt#,0) > 7500000 THEN 7500000 ELSE NVL(#mnrnAmnt#,0) END) * 0.10 END) , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE YETA3130 SET EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy# , SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd# , MNRN_SQNO=#mnrnSqno# , DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# , MNRN_NAME=#mnrnName# , MNRN_RSNO=#mnrnRsno# , MNRN_TYHU=(fcBass0300ITEMNM(#dpobCd#, #mnrnTyhu#, '11')) , MNRN_AREA=#mnrnArea# , MNRN_ADDR=#mnrnAddr# , MNRN_STDT=#mnrnStdt# , MNRN_EDDT=#mnrnEddt# , MNRN_AMNT=#mnrnAmnt# , MNRN_DUAM=(CASE WHEN ((CASE WHEN NVL(#mnrnAmnt#,0) > 7500000 THEN 7500000 ELSE NVL(#mnrnAmnt#,0) END) * 0.10) > 750000 THEN 750000 ELSE (CASE WHEN NVL(#mnrnAmnt#,0) > 7500000 THEN 7500000 ELSE NVL(#mnrnAmnt#,0) END) * 0.10 END) , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy# AND SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd# AND MNRN_SQNO=#mnrnSqno# AND DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM YETA3130 WHERE EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy# AND SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd# AND MNRN_SQNO=#mnrnSqno# AND DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#

DELETE FROM YETA3130 WHERE EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy# AND SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd# AND DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
sqlMap.select: SELECT EDAC_RVYY , SETT_GBCD , MNRN_SQNO , DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , MNRN_NAME , MNRN_RSNO , MNRN_TYHU , MNRN_AREA , MNRN_ADDR , MNRN_STDT , MNRN_EDDT , MNRN_AMNT , MNRN_DUAM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YETA3130 WHERE EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy# AND SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd# AND MNRN_SQNO=#mnrnSqno# AND DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT EDAC_RVYY , SETT_GBCD , fcBass0300CDNM(DPOB_CD, SETT_GBCD) AS SETT_GBNM , SETT_GBCD as settGbcdcommCd , MNRN_SQNO , DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , MNRN_NAME , MNRN_RSNO , MNRN_TYHU , fcBass0300CDNM(DPOB_CD, MNRN_TYHU) AS MNRN_TYHU_NM , (SELECT C.COMM_CD FROM BASS0300 C WHERE C.DPOB_CD = DPOB_CD AND C.RPSTTV_CD = 'Y007' AND C.MANGE_ITEM11 = MNRN_TYHU)AS mnrnTyhucommCd , fcBass0300CDNM(DPOB_CD, (SELECT C.COMM_CD FROM BASS0300 C WHERE C.DPOB_CD = DPOB_CD AND C.RPSTTV_CD = 'Y007' AND C.MANGE_ITEM11 = MNRN_TYHU)) AS mnrnTyhucommCdNm , MNRN_AREA , MNRN_ADDR , MNRN_STDT , MNRN_EDDT , MNRN_AMNT , MNRN_DUAM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YETA3130 WHERE
DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy#
SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd#
SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
ORDER BY EDAC_RVYY DESC , SETT_GBCD DESC , MNRN_SQNO DESC , DPOB_CD DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM >= #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM YETA3130 WHERE
DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy#
SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd#
SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT EDAC_RVYY , SETT_GBCD , MNRN_SQNO , DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , MNRN_NAME , MNRN_RSNO , MNRN_TYHU , MNRN_AREA , MNRN_ADDR , MNRN_STDT , MNRN_EDDT , MNRN_AMNT , MNRN_DUAM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YETA3130 WHERE 1=1
EDAC_RVYY = #searchKeyword#
SETT_GBCD LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY EDAC_RVYY DESC , SETT_GBCD DESC , MNRN_SQNO DESC , DPOB_CD DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM >= #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM YETA3130 WHERE 1=1
EDAC_RVYY = #searchKeyword#
SETT_GBCD LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
